articles.title: "Everything Was Under Water In 15 Minutes": Floods Tear Through Germany - NDTV
articles.description: Devastating floods have torn through entire villages and killed at least 128 people in Europe, most of them in western Germany where stunned emergency services were still combing the wreckage on Friday.
articles.content:
People shovel mud to clear a street in Bad Neuenahr-Ahrweiler, western Germany. Highlights

articles.title: ‘End of the EU!’ Donald Tusk warns internal conflicts will destroy the bloc amid standoff - Daily Express
articles.description: DONALD TUSK has warned the European Union could be destroyed from within amid an internal standoff with Poland and Hungary.

articles.title: At least 126 people dead as Europe reels from worst floods in years - SBS News

articles.title: Huge floods leave at least 108 dead in Europe - News24
